Delete Version Label

Use the Delete Version Label dialog box (Actions | Version Label | Delete) to remove a version label from a revision.

Field Descriptions

Version Label Enter the version label to delete or click the Browse button to select one.
Include Files in Subprojects This field is available only if a project or folder is selected. Select to delete version labels within subprojects that match the label you selected.


See Also
